knimeNode.name: BERT Model Selector
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node allows downloading the model available on TensorFlow Hub.

fullDescription.intro: The node allows downloading the model available on TensorFlow Hub. Only models provided by Google are available link. The model can be cached on a disk.

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: Model selection from the TensorFlow Hub list.
A path where the models will be stored for further usage.
An arbitrary link to a model. Use with caution since there is no guarantee that the model will be compatible with the node.
A path to a cached model on a disk.

ports.outPort: The BERT model that was downloaded or read from cache.
